text: 22 Jump Street is a 2014 criminal comedy movie. The movie is about two police officers who go undercover at a fraternity. Their friendship is pushed to the limit. Channing Tatum plays Jenko. Jonah Hill plays Morton. The movie picks up from where the first movie left off. It was released in June 2014. == Other websites == * Category:2014 action movies Category:2014 buddy movies Category:2014 comedy movies Category:2014 crime movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s criminal comedy movies Category:2010s sequel movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Buddy action movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:2010s English-language movies
title: 22 Jump Street
